EmailTemplate.subject: You're confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/challenges-in-clinical-research]]> Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Challenges in Clinical Research: Aridhia Disrupts Technology Approach to Research Analytics on Wednesday, July 20, 2016. Please see event details below:
Date: Wednesday, July 20, 2016 Time: 7:00AM PDT Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1215831/0DE865807576F8C5F15B276F537C3D8E]]>
Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
The Pivotal Team
